dcterms:creator: Alexander Toet
dcterms:description: The TNO dataset contains multiband image data that is useful for various imaging applications, particularly in the context of infrared and visible image fusion.
dcterms:title: TNO

dcterms:description: M3FD is a multi-scenario multi-modality benchmark dataset designed for fusing infrared and visible images for object detection.
dcterms:title: M3FD

dcterms:description: MFNet is a dataset aimed at real-time semantic segmentation for autonomous vehicles, featuring multi-spectral scenes.
dcterms:title: MFNet
